text: Miika Heikkilä (born 7 February 1992) is a Finnish ice hockey player. He is currently playing with Tappara in the Finnish Liiga. Heikkilä made his Liiga debut playing with Lahti Pelicans during the 2014–15 Liiga season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish ice hockey forwards Category:Lahti Pelicans players Category:Tappara players
title: Miika Heikkilä
